name: Friday Night Funkin D-Sides for Chromebooks
name_original: Friday Night Funkin D-Sides for Chromebooks
description:
original mod: https://gamebanana.com/mods/305122  

v0.0.1: D Sides mod is here! notes: girlfriend is static for better optimizations (yes, it is hard to optimize her), the menu characters look way too big, tutorial is not changed, and dadbattle has the same difficulty in easy, normal and hard (i was having problems on the data of dadbattle) and monster looks kinda big.
